system.prerequisites: Smash da Gitz, Up an' at Em!
system.sustained: As long as Weirdboy sustains this power, they or any allied Orks in range may re-roll a total number of Characteristic Tests equal to Psy Rating. If however any characteristic test is failed after being re-rolled this way, the power ends automatically and the Weirdboy immediately rolls once on Weird Fings table, losing any unused re-rolls for that round.
